title: Important Update: e-Filing Portal Downtime Announced for Feb 21-22, 2026
content:
# Important Update: e-Filing Portal Downtime Announced for Feb 21-22, 2026

Ek important update hai. Income Tax Department ne e-Filing portal par scheduled maintenance activity announce ki hai, jiske karan portal kuch ghanto ke liye unavailable rahega.

*   **What:** The e-Filing portal will be unavailable due to scheduled maintenance.
*   **When:** From February 21, 2026, 11:00 PM IST, to February 22, 2026, 08:00 AM IST.
*   **Impact:** During this period, taxpayers and professionals will not be able to access the e-Filing portal for any services.
*   **Reason:** This is a routine maintenance activity by the Income Tax Department to ensure smooth functioning of the portal. The department has expressed regret for any inconvenience caused.

Please plan your e-Filing activities accordingly to avoid any last-minute issues.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.incometax.gov.in/)

*Published on: 21 February 2026*
